userId.description: Your Apify user ID. You can find it here

apifyToken.description: Your Apify account API token. You can find it here

datasetId.description: ID of the dataset you would like to load to Airbyte.

clean.description: If set to true, only clean items will be downloaded from the dataset. See description of what clean means in Apify API docs. If not sure, set clean to false.
